channel.title: PlayScape Errors
channel.description:
Hey, can somebody please help me fix this issue? Thanks! I often get a Null Exception pointer error: [code]Exception in thread "main"
java.lang.ullPointerException at stream.writeString(stream.java:236) at
NPC.appendNPCUpdateBlock(NPC.java:81) at
PlayerHandler.updateNPC(PlayerHandler.java:256
) at client.update(client.java:12390) at
PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:22) at server.main(server.java:46)[/code]
How can I fix this? I'll give adminship to anybody who can help. Thanks!

item.title: PlayScape Errors
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Yeah that’s what I figured, so I decided to see if it was something I did, or the source, and I went and got a fresh FakeScape source (Playscape is based on it).

The FakeScape source has the same error.

Read full topic

item.title: PlayScape Errors
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

It doesn’t just randomly do that, you did something wrong. Always back-up

Read full topic

item.title: PlayScape Errors
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

I haven’t just added anything, its been doing this since I got it.

item.title: PlayScape Errors
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Hey, can somebody please help me fix this issue? Thanks!
I often get a Null Exception pointer error:

[code]Exception in thread “main”

java.lang.ullPointerException
at stream.writeString(stream.java:236)
at

NPC.appendNPCUpdateBlock(NPC.java:81)
at

PlayerHandler.updateNPC(PlayerHandler.java:256

)
at client.update(client.java:12390)
at

PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:22)
at server.main(server.java:46)[/code]

How can I fix this?
I’ll give adminship to anybody who can help.
Thanks!

Read full topic
